name: Dragon War Tale of Fae (Alpha)
description: Dragon War Tale of Fae is a RPG that follows the Paladin Fae around in a quest to rid the three corrupted dragons. The humans,elves, and dragons have been at peace for a long time now after the last great war, now the elder dragon has died, and the dragons turn to the humans, and elves as suspects. Fae must complete her quest to fill the amulet of tri in order to restore order to the world.
